headline: Crown Castle (CCI) Valuation in Focus Following Leadership Transition to New CEO Christian Hillabrant
summary: If you’re a shareholder or just watching from the sidelines, Crown Castle (CCI) likely has your attention today. The company’s new President and CEO, Christian H. Hillabrant, officially took the reins and a board seat on September 15. These leadership transitions do not happen every day. Any time the top job changes hands, investors start to wonder what it might mean for strategy, operations, and ultimately the stock price. This leadership change appears to have been top of mind for the...
